job_tasks.phrase: Build and manage end-to-end data pipelines and large datasets
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of creating and maintaining data infrastructure, which falls under Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Train large models on multi-node GPU clusters
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the core activity of training models, a key component of the Modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: develops large language models from scratch
job_tasks.justification: Developing models from scratch, especially large language models, is a direct indicator of the Modeling task.
Researching and experimenting with models falls under the broader scope of Modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: lay the foundations, research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies
job_tasks.justification: While research and experimentation are covered in TASK3, 'laying the foundations' and 'de-risking' can imply the software development needed to make these technologies usable or ready for further stages.

job_tasks.phrase: pursue research projects on foundation models for language and code
job_tasks.justification: This phrase, combined with the context of building AI-powered experiences, suggests developing and integrating these models, which aligns with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: builds large language models from scratch
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the creation and development of models, fitting the Modeling category.

soft_skills.phrase: Present your work in research papers of which you will become a coauthor

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs), including developing them from scratch and conducting research on them. This aligns with the core definition of a GenAI Engineer, particularly the focus on generative models and research.
